events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still haven't received any tracking updates or delivery confirmation. This delay is very frustrating.
Automatically classified issue as Delivery Delay based on keywords indicating late shipment and tracking problems.
Assigned customer support agent to handle the delayed shipment inquiry and assist with providing shipment status.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your order. I'm here to help and will check the status of your shipment for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look up the details of your delivery?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 456 Elm Street, Springfield, IL 62704.
After checking, it appears there was a delay with the courier, but your package is now out for delivery and should arrive within 48 hours.
Thank you for the update. I'm glad to hear my package is on its way and expect to receive it soon.
I'm marking this case as resolved since your delivery is now scheduled to arrive shortly. Please contact us if you need any further help.
Checking in to ensure your package was delivered and that youâ€™re satisfied with the resolution to your delay issue.
Closing the case now as the delivery issue has been resolved to your satisfaction. Thank you for your patience.
